IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PHAROS ACADEMY CHARTER SCHOOL IS A K-12 PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL LOCATED IN THE LONGWOOD SECTION OF THE BRONX, NY. OUR MISSION IS TO DEVELOP SCHOLARS WHO COMMUNICATE WELL, ARE INTELLECTUALLY CURIOUS, AND SOLVE PROBLEMS USING DIFFERENT APPROACHES. WE ARE UNAPOLOGETICALLY COMMITTED TO EDUCATING BRONX KIDS AND WILL STOP AT NOTHING TO CLOSE ALL URBAN-EDUCATION GAPS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PHAROS ACADEMY CHARTER SCHOOL IS A K-12 PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL LOCATED IN THE LONGWOOD SECTION OF THE BRONX, NY. OUR MISSION IS TO DEVELOP SCHOLARS WHO COMMUNICATE WELL, ARE INTELLECTUALLY CURIOUS, AND SOLVE PROBLEMS USING DIFFERENT APPROACHES. WE ARE UNAPOLOGETICALLY COMMITTED TO EDUCATING BRONX KIDS AND WILL STOP AT NOTHING TO CLOSE ALL URBAN-EDUCATION GAPS.
IRS990.Desc: EDUCATIONAL SERVICES - A CHARTER SCHOOL OFFERING CLASSES FROM KINDERGARTEN THROUGH TWELFTH GRADE. THE SCHOOL HAD 683 STUDENTS ATTENDING DURING THE FISCAL YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CHARTER SCHOOL, BPHC, AND BRONX SUPPORT CORPORATION ARE TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND APPLICABLE STATE REGULATIONS AND, ACCORDINGLY, ARE EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE TAXES ON INCOME. THE CHARTER SCHOOL, BPHC, AND BRONX SUPPORT CORPORATION FILE FORM 990 TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION. IN ADDITION, BPHC AND BRONX SUPPORT CORPORATION FILE A FORM CHAR 500 IN NEW YORK STATE. THE LLC IS A SINGLE MEMBER LLC AND IS DISREGARDED FOR TAX PURPOSES. THE TAX RETURNS FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2019 THROUGH JUNE 30, 2022 ARE STILL SUBJECT TO POTENTIAL AUDIT BY THE IRS. MANAGEMENT OF THE CHARTER SCHOOL, BPHC, AND BRONX SUPPORT CORPORATION BELIEVE THEY HAVE NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND, ACCORDINGLY WILL NOT RECOGNIZE ANY LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS.
THE SCHOOL RECRUITS BY WORD OF MOUTH IN THE COMMUNITY AND THROUGH THE DISTRIBUTION OF FLYERS IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD, WHICH INCLUDES THE RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY.
FEDERAL AND NEW YORK STATE GOVERNMENT GRANTS ARE RECEIVED TO ENHANCE TEACHERS' SKILLS AND IMPROVE TECHNOLOGY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL DOES NOT HAVE COMMITTEES WITH THE AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY SENIOR DIRECTOR OF OPERATIONS AND COMPLIANCE AT THE SCHOOL BEFORE BEING FORWARDED TO THE SCHOOL'S FINANCE COMMITTEE FOR THEIR REVIEW. IT IS THEN REVIEWED BY THE FULL BOARD PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL REQUIRES ALL BOARD MEMBERS TO FORMALLY DISCLOSE IN WRITING ANY CONFLICT OF INTEREST MATTERS. BOARD MEMBERS SUBMIT UPDATES TO THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST DECLARATION ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION OF THE ORGANIZATION'S PRINCIPALS INCLUDED REVIEW, DELIBERATION AND APPROVAL OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, WITH COMPARISONS TO OTHER NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK, FINANCIAL POLICIES AND PROCEDURES GUIDE, CHARTER SCHOOL MANUAL AND OTHER POLICIES (INVESTMENT, CONFLICT OF INTEREST, ETC) ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THIS PROCESS IS CONSISTENT WITH PRIOR YEARS.
